issue.title: [Rust] Add support for iterators over binary arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10477](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10477). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Like we do for primitive arrays and string arrays, this issue concerns adding iterator support for binary arrays.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10477?focusedCommentId=17227788) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8576
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8576>
